name: Close Call Reporter
description: Store the close-call data using Azure* Redis Cache from Microsoft, Redis Store* from IBM Bluemix*, or ElastiCache* using Redis* from Amazon Web Services* (AWS), different cloud services for connecting IoT solutions including data analysis, machine learning, and a variety of productivity tools to simplify the process of connecting your sensors to the cloud and getting your IoT project up and running quickly.
author: Intel Corporation & Hybrid Group

hwreq: Grove Distance Interrupter connected to digital pin 2 (Grove Base Shield Port D2)
DFRobot Distance Interrupter connected to digital pin 2 (DFRobot IO expansion board Port D2)
